EmailTemplate.subject: What Could eCommerce Look Like at Weis Markets?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: At Weis Markets, you know your brand better than anyone. Your brand quality is what keeps your customers coming back – and turns your new customers into loyal ones. But with your current eCommerce solution, don’t you worry about overspending, only to lose your connection with your customers? In comes NCR Freshop. NCR Freshop will enable you to take your unique in-store experience and translate it online, taking the in-store experience and delivering it with consistency in a digital world. Built with retailers like you in mind, NCR Freshop: - Delivers all essential eCommerce functionality and more — making improvements faster and easier to implement - Easily integrates into current systems — with new features always being added and easily deployed to fit your eCommerce strategy - Gives you full control over your products and processes — at the corporate level or store level, increasing profits through the sale of merchandise and fresh, higher-margin products See what NCR Freshop can do for you at Weis Markets. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Got questions?
